amendment.description: Amendment as modified, increases from $1.8 billion to $2.5 billion the authorization level for the grant program that makes funds available for combined sewer overflows and sanitary sewer overflows.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-36 to increase from $1.8 billion to $2.5 billion the authorization level for the grant program that makes funds available for combined sewer overflows and sanitary sewer overflows.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Driehaus amendment (A010) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Driehaus amendment (A010) modified by unanimous consent. The modification is technical in nature.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Driehaus.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Driehaus amendment (A010) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
